trophies.trophyName: Platinum
trophies.trophyDetail: Collect all Killzone 3 trophies

trophies.trophyName: Ready For Battle - Complete weapons training
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed weapons training in Prologue

trophies.trophyName: In Your Face - First Brutal Melee
trophies.trophyDetail: Performed first Brutal Melee move

trophies.trophyName: Time For A Dip - Reach the river
trophies.trophyDetail: Reached the Corinth River with the convoy

trophies.trophyName: No Witnesses - Destroy all dropships on the Highway
trophies.trophyDetail: Destroyed all dropships on the Highway

trophies.trophyName: Mopping Up - Kill 40 Helghast foot soldiers
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed 40 or more Helghast foot soldiers on the beach

trophies.trophyName: Sawn Off - Destroy all chasing APCs
trophies.trophyDetail: Destroyed all chasing SawBlade APCs in the Senlin Beach section

trophies.trophyName: Smoking Wrecks - Destroy all Tanks on Senlin Beach
trophies.trophyDetail: Destroyed all the Helghast Tanks in the Senlin Beach section

trophies.trophyName: Save The Intruders - Arc APCs destroyed
trophies.trophyDetail: Successfully assisted with defeating the Arc APCs

trophies.trophyName: Turn The Tables - Melee Kill a Capture Trooper
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed a Capture Trooper using melee

trophies.trophyName: Spiky Personality - Kill a Helghast using a Burster
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed a Helghast by shooting a Burster plant

trophies.trophyName: Never There - Sneak past Helghast
trophies.trophyDetail: Sneaked past all Helghast in the Jungle without alerting any of them

trophies.trophyName: ISA TV - Establish communications
trophies.trophyDetail: Made contact with Earth

trophies.trophyName: Minigunned - Destroy all targets
trophies.trophyDetail: Destroyed everything while using the Minigun on the Intruder

trophies.trophyName: Aerial Superiority - Kill 5 Helghast while in the air
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed 5 Helghast while airborne using the Jetpack

trophies.trophyName: Quick Exit - Escape the Oil Rig quickly
trophies.trophyDetail: Got off the 2nd Rig within 2 minutes.

trophies.trophyName: Into The Lair - Reach the cable car
trophies.trophyDetail: Reached the cable car and gained access to Stahl Arms South

trophies.trophyName: Jail Break - Liberate Narville
trophies.trophyDetail: Liberated Narville from Stahl Arms South

trophies.trophyName: Go Down And Stay Down - Destroy the ATAC
trophies.trophyDetail: Defeated the ATAC outside the Stahl Arms facility

trophies.trophyName: Shattered - Destroy all glass in the Labs
trophies.trophyDetail: Destroyed all glass panes in the Stahl Arms South laboratories

trophies.trophyName: Iced - Destroy all Ice-Saws and Dropships
trophies.trophyDetail: Destroyed all 4 Helghast Ice-Saws and all 6 Dropships

trophies.trophyName: Pinpoint - Kill the Heavy with an StA-14
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed the Heavy using the StA-14 rifle

trophies.trophyName: You Drive - Drive the Mobile Factory
trophies.trophyDetail: Took over the controls of the Mobile Factory

trophies.trophyName: Bring It Down - Defeat the MAWLR
trophies.trophyDetail: Defeated the MAWLR defending the Space Elevator

trophies.trophyName: Completist - Destroy everything on the MAWLR
trophies.trophyDetail: Destroyed every destructible weapon on the MAWLR while on foot and on the Intruder

trophies.trophyName: Let's Go Home - Destroy Stahl's Cruiser
trophies.trophyDetail: Destroyed Stahl's Cruiser and left the planet on any difficulty

trophies.trophyName: Victory - Complete Campaign on Elite
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed every mission on Elite difficulty

trophies.trophyName: Evening The Odds - Kill 500 Helghast
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed 500 Helghast

trophies.trophyName: Now It's Personal - Kill 1000 Helghast
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed 1000 Helghast

trophies.trophyName: Fight To The Last - Kill 1500 Helghast
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed 1500 Helghast

trophies.trophyName: Cagefighter - Kill 10 Helghast using Brutal Melee
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed 10 Helghast using Brutal Melee

trophies.trophyName: Close Quarters Killer - Kill 25 Helghast using Brutal Melee
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed 25 Helghast using Brutal Melee

trophies.trophyName: Hand To Hand Master - Kill 50 Helghast using Brutal Melee
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed 50 Helghast using Brutal Melee

trophies.trophyName: Frag Out - Kill 3 Helghast with 1 Frag Grenade
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed 3 Helghast using 1 fragmentation grenade

trophies.trophyName: One Each - Kill 3 Helghast with Shotgun Pistol, no reloads
trophies.trophyDetail: Shot and killed 3 Helghast using the Shotgun Pistol without reloading or switching weapons

trophies.trophyName: Eagle Eye - Every Sniper Rifle bullet is a kill
trophies.trophyDetail: Shot and killed 6 Helghast using the Sniper Rifle without reloading or switching weapons

trophies.trophyName: Frazzle Dazzle - Kill 3 Helghast with one shot from the StA5X Arc Cannon
trophies.trophyDetail: Used the StA5X Arc Cannon to kill 3 Helghast with one shot

trophies.trophyName: Power Spike - Nail a Helghast to an exploding object
trophies.trophyDetail: Used the Boltgun to nail a Helghast to an exploding object

trophies.trophyName: Excessive Force - Kill a lone Helghast with the WASP secondary fire
trophies.trophyDetail: Used the secondary fire function of the WASP launcher to kill a single Helghast

trophies.trophyName: Spread The Love - Kill 5 Helghast at once using the WASP's secondary fire
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed 5 Helghast at once using the secondary fire mode of the WASP launcher

trophies.trophyName: Double Trouble - Reach the river in Co-op
trophies.trophyDetail: Made it to the Corinth River in Co-op mode

trophies.trophyName: Stranded Together - Reach the Extraction Point in Co-op
trophies.trophyDetail: Made it to the Extraction Point in Co-op mode

trophies.trophyName: Up Close & Personal - Brutal Melee another player
trophies.trophyDetail: Used the Brutal Melee move against another player

trophies.trophyName: Team Player - Play a match as part of a squad
trophies.trophyDetail: Joined and completed a match as part of a squad

trophies.trophyName: Grand Slam - Win a match in 3 multiplayer modes
trophies.trophyDetail: Won a match in Operations, Warzone & Guerrilla Warfare modes

trophies.trophyName: Pilot's Wings - Mid-air kill
trophies.trophyDetail: Got a mid-air kill using the Jet Pack in any multiplayer mode

trophies.trophyName: Iron Man - Get a kill with the Exo
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed a player using the Exo in any multiplayer mode

trophies.trophyName: Medic! - Revive another player
trophies.trophyDetail: Revived a friendly player for the first time

trophies.trophyName: Handy Man - Repair an object
trophies.trophyDetail: Repaired an object for the first time

trophies.trophyName: Now You See Me - Kill using Cloak
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed another player while cloaked

trophies.trophyName: Spy Game - Kill using Disguise
trophies.trophyDetail: Killed another player while disguised

trophies.trophyName: Turf War - Capture a Tactical Spawn Area
trophies.trophyDetail: Captured a Tactical Spawn Area for the first time

trophies.trophyName: Demolitionist – Destroy objectives
trophies.trophyDetail: Demolish both buildings by winning Search & Destroy as ISA and Helghast in Salamun Market

trophies.trophyName: Tactical Mastery – Help capture Tactical Spawn Areas
trophies.trophyDetail: Be playing at the moment your faction secures all four Tactical Spawn Areas simultaneously in Salamun Market

trophies.trophyName: Death By Proxies – Proximity Mine kills
trophies.trophyDetail: Using Proximity Mines, kill two enemies within one minute in Blood Gracht

trophies.trophyName: Blood Streak – Kill streak
trophies.trophyDetail: Get a 5 kill streak in Blood Gracht

trophies.trophyName: Brutal Footsteps - Silent killing
trophies.trophyDetail: With the Silent Footsteps skill active, Brutal Melee an enemy player

trophies.trophyName: Little Big Weapons – Kill with secondary weapons
trophies.trophyDetail: Get 15 kills using secondary weapons in a single match

trophies.trophyName: Automata For The People – Automata destruction
trophies.trophyDetail: Destroy an enemy Sentry Turret, Sentry Drone and Medi-Droid in the same match

trophies.trophyName: Jetpack on Exo Action – Destroy Exoskeleton
trophies.trophyDetail: Destroy an enemy Exoskeleton with your Jetpack while in flight in The Junkyard

trophies.trophyName: Exo on Jetpack Action – Kill a Jetpack
trophies.trophyDetail: Kill a flying enemy Jetpack with an Exoskeleton in The Junkyard

trophies.trophyName: Deadly Threesome – Triple Kill
trophies.trophyDetail: Get a triple kill while playing in Stahl Arms

trophies.trophyName: I See You – Minigun a Marksman
trophies.trophyDetail: Kill a Marksman with the Mounted Minigun in Stahl Arms

trophies.trophyName: Highly Decorated – Unlock Ribbons
trophies.trophyDetail: Unlock all Ribbons in a single match while playing Operations or Warzone

trophies.trophyName: 5 for 5 – Lots of guns
trophies.trophyDetail: Kill 5 enemies with 5 different primary, secondary or explosive weapons in a single match

trophies.trophyName: Jack of All Trades – Kill all careers
trophies.trophyDetail: Kill one enemy of each career type in a single match

trophies.trophyName: No Go For Launch – Deactivate missile launch
trophies.trophyDetail: Deactivate the missile launch while playing in Lente Missile Base

trophies.trophyName: Exhausted  - Get killed by missiles
trophies.trophyDetail: Get killed by the exhaust from the missile launch while playing in Lente Missile Base

trophies.trophyName: Bullet Spam – Kill with the Minigun pickup
trophies.trophyDetail: Get 5 kills with the Minigun pickup in a single match while playing in Mobile Factory

trophies.trophyName: Mini-Gone  - Kill a player with the Minigun
trophies.trophyDetail: Kill any player that is using the Minigun pickup in Mobile factory

trophies.trophyName: Radec's Revenge – Kill the ISA
trophies.trophyDetail: Kill 5 different ISA players in a single match while playing in Radec Academy

trophies.trophyName: Turn Back Time  - VC9 Missile Launcher kill
trophies.trophyDetail: Get a single VC9 Missile Launcher kill in Radec Academy

trophies.trophyName: Jetpack on Jetpack Action – Jetpack killer
trophies.trophyDetail: While flying in mid-air, shoot down and kill another flying Jetpack player in Tharsis Depot

trophies.trophyName: Frequent Flyer – Fly for 60 seconds
trophies.trophyDetail: With a Jetpack equipped, fly for 60 seconds or more in Tharsis Depot

trophies.trophyName: Hacker – Hack turrets
trophies.trophyDetail: As an Engineer, successfully hack 3 enemy turrets in a single match

trophies.trophyName: Tag. You're It.  – Kill using the Recon ability
trophies.trophyDetail: Kill 3 enemies within a single activation of the Recon ability while playing as a Tactician

trophies.trophyName: Cloak and Fragger – Kill Marksmen
trophies.trophyDetail: While playing as a Marksman, kill 5 enemy Marksmen in a single match

trophies.trophyName: Taken From Behind – Brutal Melee from behind
trophies.trophyDetail: Brutal Melee 3 enemy players from behind while disguised in a single match while playing as an Infiltrator

trophies.trophyName: Immortal  - Survive bleedout
trophies.trophyDetail: With the Field Medic Triage ++ ability active, survive bleedout 5 times in a single match
